#  nst-textarea



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute          | Description                                     | Type                  | Default     |
| ------------------ | ------------------ | ----------------------------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `custom_class`     | `custom_class`     | Custom class to be attached to the form element | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `disabled`         | `disabled`         | Form element disabled state                     | `boolean`             | `undefined` |
| `error`            | `error`            | Form element has error state                    | `boolean`             | `undefined` |
| `icon_left`        | `icon_left`        | Left icon name (material icons)                 | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `inline_input`     | `inline_input`     | Inline input variation                          | `boolean`             | `undefined` |
| `label`            | `label`            | Form element label                              | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `message`          | `message`          | Form element message - bellow input             | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `name`             | `name`             | Form element name                               | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `placeholder`      | `placeholder`      | Form element placeholder                        | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `required`         | `required`         | Form element is required                        | `boolean`             | `undefined` |
| `rows`             | `rows`             | Textarea rows attribute                         | `number`              | `2`         |
| `size`             | `size`             | Form element size                               | `"medium" \| "small"` | `'medium'`  |
| `tooltip_label`    | `tooltip_label`    | Info tooltip label                              | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `tooltip_position` | `tooltip_position` | Info tooltip position                           | `string`              | `'top'`     |
| `value`            | `value`            | Form element value                              | `string`              | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event           | Description       | Type               |
| --------------- | ----------------- | ------------------ |
| `changeInput`   | Emits on change   | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `keydownInput`  | Emits on keydown  | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `keypressInput` | Emits on keypress | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `keyupInput`    | Emits on keyup    | `CustomEvent<any>` |
